#### Requesting Letters of Recommendation
Send **one email** with:  
1) Name + CUNY ID + course(s)/term(s) + final grade(s)  
2) **Deadline(s)** & submission method (portal/email)  
3) **CV/Resume** + **unofficial transcript**  
4) What you’re applying for & what to emphasize  
5) Required forms (PDF) & **FERPA waiver** status, if needed  
6) ≥ **3 weeks’ notice** before first deadline

:::{.mt-2}
[Email template](mailto:ryan.oloughlin@qc.cuny.edu?subject=Letter%20Request%3A%20%5BYour%20Name%5D%20%E2%80%94%20Deadline%20YYYY-MM-DD&body=Dear%20Prof.%20O%E2%80%99Loughlin%2C%0A%0AI%27m%20requesting%20a%20letter%20of%20recommendation%20for%20%5Bprogram%2Fjob%5D.%20Details%20below%3A%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20Name%20%2F%20CUNY%20ID%3A%20%0A%E2%80%A2%20Course(s)%20with%20you%20%2B%20term(s)%20%2B%20final%20grade(s)%3A%20%0A%E2%80%A2%20Deadline(s)%20%26%20submission%20method(s)%3A%20%0A%E2%80%A2%20Why%20I%E2%80%99m%20applying%20%26%20what%20to%20emphasize%3A%20%0A%E2%80%A2%20Attachments%3A%20CV%2C%20unofficial%20transcript%2C%20forms%20(PDF)%0A%E2%80%A2%20FERPA%20waiver%3A%20Yes%2FNo%0A%0AThank%20you!%0A){.btn .btn-outline-primary}

#### Campus resources 
- **Writing Center**: [schedule an appointment for personalized help](https://www.qc.cuny.edu/academics/wc/)
- **Library Research Help** — [consult with a librarian](https://www.qc.cuny.edu/library/research/)  
- **Accessibility/Disability Services** — [accommodations & support](https://www.qc.cuny.edu/sp/)
- **Counseling Services** — [mental health support](https://www.qc.cuny.edu/cs/)  
- **Computer Labs / Printing** — [laptops, printers, software access](https://www.qc.cuny.edu/its/computer-labs/)
- **Career Center** — [resumes, internships, grad school advising](https://www.qc.cuny.edu/academics/cei/)
::: 
:::
::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-lg-6} 
::: {.section-card}
#### Off-campus / general resources

**Writing & citation**
- [Purdue OWL](https://owl.purdue.edu/) — citation + academic writing guides  
- [UNC Writing Center Handouts](https://writingcenter.unc.edu/tips-and-tools/) — quick how-to sheets  
**Philosophy references**
- [Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy (SEP)](https://plato.stanford.edu/) — peer-reviewed entries  
- [Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy (IEP)](https://iep.utm.edu/) — accessible overviews  
- [PhilPapers](https://philpapers.org/) — database of philosophy articles & books
**Research & tools**
- [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/) — literature search  
- [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/) + [ZoteroBib](https://zbib.org/) — free reference manager & instant bibliographies  
:::
